dt: {bc}a veiled or equivocal reflection on character or reputation
{bc}a parenthetical explanation introduced into the text of a legal document

et: Latin, by nodding, from {it}innuere{/it} to nod to, make a sign to, from {it}in-{/it} + {it}nuere{/it} to nod; akin to Latin {it}nutare{/it} to nod {ma}{mat|numen|}{/ma}
shortdef: an oblique allusion : hint, insinuation; especially : a veiled or equivocal reflection on character or reputation
a parenthetical explanation introduced into the text of a legal document
